pages.text: When held in the offhand these magical relics inflict the player with interesting and useful abilities. Only one can be held at a given time. On craft they will have Curse of Vanishing.
While held: $(li)Gives the wearer a chance to mine duplicate resources from the world. Affects blocks in #rankine:luck_pendant.
While held: $(li)Gives the wearer increased movement speed
While held: $(li)Gives the wearer increased mining speed
While held: $(li)Stabilizes the player at a fixed y-level. Allows the player to walk (kind of slowly) through air. Unequip to descend.
While held: $(li)Gives the wearer increased health by 20 hp.
While held: $(li)Protects the wearer from new mobs. Some enemies can detect the player after certain events that agro them, such as attacking.
